products.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro
products.description: The Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro is a classic sneaker that combines iconic style with modern comfort. Available in Black/Red and White/Blue colorways, this shoe is perfect for both basketball fans and sneaker enthusiasts.

products.name: Yeezy Boost 350 V2
products.description: The Yeezy Boost 350 V2 offers a unique blend of style and comfort. Featuring Primeknit uppers and Boost cushioning, this sneaker is available in Cream White and Black/Red colorways.

products.name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
products.description: The Adidas Ultraboost 22 is designed for runners who demand both performance and style. With responsive Boost cushioning and a sleek design, this shoe comes in Black and White color options.

products.name: Nike Air Max 270 React
products.description: The Nike Air Max 270 React combines the latest Max Air cushioning with modern design. Available in White/Black and Grey/Red colorways, it's perfect for everyday wear.

products.name: Yeezy Slides
products.description: Yeezy Slides offer a minimalist design with maximum comfort. Available in Bone and Black colors, these slides are perfect for casual wear and relaxation.

products.name: Adidas NMD_R1
products.description: The Adidas NMD_R1 is a stylish sneaker that blends modern design with vintage elements. Featuring a Boost midsole and a flexible upper, it comes in Core Black and Footwear White.
